# supportsAdaptiveImageGlyph

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the document supports adaptive images in the input.

## Declaration

```swift
optional var supportsAdaptiveImageGlyph: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

When this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], the input system doesn’t allow the text input to contain adaptive images. Set the value of this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] only if your document supports adaptive images and handles them properly. For more information, see [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAdaptiveImageGlyph].

## Supporting adaptive images

- **insert(_:replacementRange:)**: Inserts an adaptive image into the text at the specifed location.
